name: setting
description:
Controls various aspects of page processing, such as the output of HTML code in pages. One
benefit of this option is managing whitespace that can occur in output pages served by CFML.

params.name: enablecfoutputonly
params.description:
Yes or No.

When set to Yes, cfsetting blocks output of HTML that resides outside cfoutput tags.

params.name: info
params.description: name of variable created for all information for this tag.

params.name: listen
params.description: do log all action, so it can report more detail with info.

params.name: showdebugoutput
params.description:
Yes or No.

When set to No, showDebugOutput suppresses debugging information that would otherwise display at the end of the generated page.

Default is Yes.

params.name: showdebug
params.description:
Yes or No. When set to No, showDebug suppresses debugging information that would
otherwise display at the end of the generated page.

params.name: showdoc
params.description:
Yes or No. When set to No, showDoc suppresses documentation/reference information that would
otherwise display at the end of the generated page.

params.name: showmetric
params.description:
Yes or No. When set to No, showMetric suppresses metric information that would
otherwise display at the end of the generated page.

params.name: requesttimeout
params.description:
Number of seconds. Time limit, after which CFML processes the page as an unresponsive thread.

Overrides the timeout set in the Lucee Administrator.

If one specifies a `requesttimeout` of `0`, the request will not time out.
